Keighley Cougars > News > 2022 > November
News
November 28, 2022
Fibreline Joins The Pride As Club Sponsor
KEIGHLEY Cougars are today delighted to announce Fibreline have joined the pride for the 2023 season as a club sponsor. One of Keighley’s most recognisable names in business, employing over 200 people at their 90,000 square foot facility in the town, the partnership will see the company sponsor the Cougars whilst using our facilities for...
Cougar Mania, Cougars Foundation, Keighley Cougars
0 comments
November 24, 2022
Club Statement – 2023 Playing Kits
FOLLOWING yesterday’s launch of the 2023 Keighley Cougars playing kits, co-owner and Chief Executive Ryan O’Neill has issued the following statement. I acknowledge the social media response to our 2023 playing kits, both positive and negative. As a club we are willing to accept criticism because we believe the messages that we are promoting are...
Cougar Mania, Keighley Cougars, League 1
1comments
November 22, 2022
Fundraiser For The Barrett Family
Keighley Cougars supporter Darren Lynam has organised a fundraiser for the family of Danny Barrett. Danny, who played Rugby League within the town for community club Keighley Albion as well as having a spell with the Cougars during his youth days, sadly passed away earlier this year. To supporter Darren’s fundraiser, the club have kindly...
Cougar Mania, Cougars Foundation, Keighley Cougars
0 comments
November 21, 2022
Cougars Launch 2023 Playing Kits
KEIGHLEY Cougars can today launch our 2023 playing jerseys ahead of our return to the Betfred Championship. In a time of uncertainty, trouble, and division, across the world our 2023 jerseys will promote the hope for a better world. The club’s theme for this season as a result is peace, love, and unity. The world...
Cougar Mania, Keighley Cougars, League 1
1comments
November 17, 2022
2023 Summer Bash Ticketing Arrangements
KEIGHLEY Cougars can today inform supporters further regarding the ticketing arrangements for the 2023 Betfred Championship Summer Bash. The bash, which will take place over the weekend of the 27/28 May at the LNER Community Stadium in York, will see the side face the Bradford Bulls in Game 3 of the day on Sunday 28th...
Cougar Mania, Keighley Cougars, League 1
0 comments
November 15, 2022
A1 Lift & Mobility Group Re-Join The Pride For Tenth Season
Keighley Cougars are today delighted to announce that A1 Lift & Mobility Group Ltd (A1 stairlifts) will continue its sponsorship of the club for the 10th consecutive season. One of the clubs most loyal supporters & sponsors for the past decade A1 Lift & Mobility Group have seen their branding & name associated with many...
Cougar Mania, Cougars Foundation, Keighley Cougars
1comments
November 15, 2022
Bulls Await At The Bash
The 2023 Betfred Championship Summer Bash is heading to York. The historic Minster city has been selected as a new venue for the seventh Summer Bash – which will be held on the Spring Bank Holiday Weekend of May 27-28, at the LNER Community Stadium. Tickets go on sale today, and demand is expected to...
Cougar Mania, Keighley Cougars, League 1
0 comments
November 13, 2022
Cougars 2023 Fixture List Revealed
KEIGHLEY Cougars will begin their Betfred Championship season by welcoming the Featherstone Rovers to Cougar Park. The visit of the Rovers, live on viaplay (formerly Premier Sports), will take place on Monday 6th February with a 7:45pm kick-off. It is a fitting start to life back in the second tier with the Cougars last game...
Cougar Mania, Keighley Cougars, League 1
2comments
November 11, 2022
Bedspredz Poultry Join The Pride As Title Sponsors
KEIGHLEY Cougars are today delighted to announce Bedspredz Poultry as the new main club sponsors. Replacing Acorn Stairlifts ahead of the 2023 season, the Castleford based company will become the title sponsors of the Cougars with their branding to be emblazoned across our playing jersey as well as several other outlets for the next two...
Cougar Mania, Cougars Foundation, Keighley Cougars
0 comments
November 7, 2022
Tigers To Visit For Jake’s Testimonial
KEIGHLEY Cougars can today announce we will be hosting the Jake Webster Testimonial year match. The fixture will take place at Cougar Park on Sunday 22nd January, with a 3pm-kick off, as we welcome Jake’s former club, Castleford Tigers of the Betfred Super League. Speaking of the fixture, Webster said: “I am both honoured and...
Cougar Mania, Keighley Cougars, League 1
